articles.content:
One of the stars of Too Hot To Handle has spilt details on a now infamous sexual encounter he had on the show.
Tall Aussie model Harry Jowsey, 23, failed to stick to the celibacy rules on a number of occasions across the Netflix show's run.

articles.title: Piers Morgan jokes he will remove son from his will if social media taunts continue - Mirror Online
articles.description: Piers Morgan revealed he was considering cutting his son Spencer out of his will for taunting him on social media for saying he would head to the pub after lockdown before seeing his sons
articles.content:
Piers Morgan said today he was considering removing his son Spencer from his will if he carries on taunting his dad on social media.

articles.description: It's world famous playwright William Shakespeare's official birthday on 23 April. Try our tricky quizzes to mark the occasion!
articles.content:
It's world-famous English playwright William Shakespeare's official birthday on 23 April. 
He is considered by many to be one of the world's greatest writers.
